summary: Drishti, a psychic tarot card reader becomes unwittingly mixed up in the disappearance and possible murder of a socialite.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Sunil Shetty|Bipasha Basu|Dino Morea|Himanshu Malik|Amrita Arora|Neha Dhupia|Rajat Bedi|Payal Rohatgi|Sharat Saxena|Sachin Khedekar|Shivaaji Satam|Yana Gupta|Atul Kale|Shashikala|Beena Banerjee|Arvin Tucker|Siddharth Ray|Zubaida|Sushovan Banerjee|Santosh P. Jadhav|Neha Bam|Priten Patil|Mallika Bhat|Balu|Joyce Arora|Ajay Bhagwat|Parth Dave|Master Smit Parekh|Laxman Gollar|Abhishek Bachchan
director: Director: Mahesh Manjrekar (as Mahesh V. Manjrekar)
title: Rakht
